recipes.title: Spanish Cold-Brew
recipes.description: Combine condensed milk, whole milk & coffee. Mix thoroughly. Adjust condensed milk to taste.

recipes.title: Cold-Brew Vanilla Float
ingredients: Favorite chocolate bar shavings to taste
recipes.description: In serving glass add scoops of ice cream. Pour coffee into glass. Sprinkle chocolate shavings to taste.

recipes.title: Sea Salt Cold-Brew
recipes.description: Dissolve sugar in coffee. Mix sea salt & cream. Serve coffee over ice. Add 1/2 cup of cream & stir. Garnish with a bit of salt.
